item.title: 阿斯莫格鲁、约翰逊和罗宾逊荣获 2024 年诺贝尔经济学奖
item.description: 达龙-阿西莫格鲁、西蒙-约翰逊和詹姆斯-罗宾逊因研究制度如何形成并影响繁荣而获得诺贝尔经济学奖。【原文：Daron Acemoglu, Simon Johnson and James A. Robinson were awarded the Nobel Prize in economics for research into how institutions are formed and affect prosperity.】

item.title: 沙特 PIF 支持的公司计划建立贸易区以促进与中国的关系
item.description: 由沙特阿拉伯主权财富基金支持的投资公司 EWPartners 正计划在沙特境内开发一个所谓的经济特区，以促进中国与这个石油资源丰富的王国的贸易往来。【原文：EWPartners, an investment firm backed by Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund, is planning to develop a so-called special economic zone inside the country to boost Chinese trade with the oil-rich kingdom.】

item.title: 欧洲监管机构表示支持德国商业银行可能进行的交易
item.description: 几位中央银行和监管部门的高级官员表示，意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）对竞争对手德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）的潜在收购很可能会获得监管部门的批准，并称几乎没有理由对该交易表示担忧。【原文：A potential takeover by UniCredit SpA of rival Commerzbank AG would likely get regulatory approval, several senior central bank and supervision officials indicated, saying there are few reasons why a deal should raise concerns.】

item.title: 中国信贷扩张超预期，但贷款额度不尽如人意
item.description: 在政府债券销售激增的帮助下，中国 9 月份的信贷扩张超出预期，但新增贷款却令人失望，这表明国内需求依然疲软。【原文：China’s credit expansion exceeded expectations in September, helped by a surge in government bond sales, while new loans disappointed in a sign of still weak domestic demand.】

item.title: 为什么 OpenAI 要与一个不知名的 "点子人 "开战？
item.description:
Guy Ravine 的 Open AI（带空格）拥有 OpenAI（不带空格）想要的商标和网站。关于人工智能的未来，他们的诉讼能给我们带来什么启示？【原文：

Guy Ravine’s Open AI (with a space) owns a trademark and website that OpenAI (no space) wants. What can their lawsuits tell us about the future of AI—and who wins in Silicon Valley?

item.title: 全球高管寻求保护免受大选引发的外汇波动影响
item.description: 距离投票日还有不到一个月的时间，美国总统大选可能会引发货币市场的动荡，这促使财务主管们加强公司的外汇套期保值。【原文：Less than a month from polling day, a toss-up US presidential election that could rattle currency markets is leading finance executives to bolster their companies’ foreign-exchange hedges.】

item.title: 地平线机器人公司据称将吸引阿里巴巴和百度作为首次公开募股的投资者
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司和百度公司是地平线机器人公司（Horizon Robotics）在香港首次公开募股的基石投资者之一。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. and Baidu Inc. are among the cornerstone investors in the Hong Kong initial public offering of Horizon Robotics, a Chinese provider of software and hardware used in autonomous driving systems, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 香港任命 Kelvin Wong 为市场监察机构主席
item.description: 香港任命 Kelvin Wong 为新任证券及期货事务监察委员会主席，任期三年。【原文：Hong Kong named Kelvin Wong as the new chairman of the Securities and Futures Commission for a three year-term.】

item.title: 土耳其公司中标承建中国避之唯恐不及的乌干达铁路
item.description: Yapi Merkezi Holdings AS 公司签署了在乌干达修建一条铁路线的协议，这有助于重振一个在中国撤资后努力寻找融资的项目。【原文：Yapi Merkezi Holdings AS signed a deal to build a railway line in Uganda, helping revive a project that struggled to find financing after China withdrew its support.】

item.title: 媒体报道称印尼下任总统召集可能的部长会议
item.description: 据当地电视台报道，印度尼西亚当选总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）在本月晚些时候举行就职典礼之前，于周一在其官邸召集部长候选人开会。【原文：Indonesia’s President-elect Prabowo Subianto called up ministerial candidates for a meeting at his residence on Monday, ahead of his inauguration later this month, according to local TV outlets.】

item.title: 陷入困境的电池制造商 Northvolt 缴纳税款，通过关键测试
item.description: 这家陷入困境的电池生产商发言人说，瑞典 Northvolt AB 公司周一支付了到期的税款，在该公司争相筹集更多资金之际，遵守了一个受到密切关注的最后期限。【原文：Sweden’s Northvolt AB paid a tax bill that fell due on Monday, a spokesman for the troubled battery maker said, meeting a closely watched deadline as the company scrambles to raise more funding.】

item.title: 铜业公司任命前高盛高管为首席执行官，进行战略调整
item.description: 加密货币托管公司 Copper Technologies Ltd. 已聘请前高盛集团董事总经理 Amar Kuchinad 接替 Dmitry Tokarev 担任集团首席执行官，该公司希望获得更多传统金融公司的客户，并进军美国市场。【原文：Crypto custodian Copper Technologies Ltd. has hired Amar Kuchinad, a former Goldman Sachs Group Inc. managing director, to replace Dmitry Tokarev as group CEO, as it looks to secure more traditional financial firms as clients and make inroads in the US market.】

item.title: 亚洲首次公开募股（IPO）银行家展望未来，本周募资 60 亿美元，走出中国市场低迷阴影
item.description: 本周，银行家们正在日本和印度筹备超过 60 亿美元的首次公开募股，在中国交易长期低迷的情况下，这两个市场已成为日益重要的收入来源，银行家们也因此得到了提振。【原文：Bankers are working on more than $6 billion of initial public offerings in Japan and India this week, getting a boost from two markets that have become an increasingly important revenue source amid a prolonged deal slump in China.】

item.title: 维勒鲁瓦称法国金融科技基金募集将于 2025 年初回升
item.description: 法国央行行长弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，由于欧洲央行借贷成本降低，融资成本减少，明年初法国金融科技公司的筹资活动可能会有所回升。【原文：Bank of France Governor Francois Villeroy de Galhau said fund raising for financial technology firms in the country could pick up at the start of next year as lower European Central Bank borrowing costs have reduced financing costs.】

item.title: 英国赌博股在报道英国考虑增税后下滑
item.description: 据报道，英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）可能正在考虑对博彩业增税多达 30 亿英镑（约合 39 亿美元）的建议，此后英国博彩业股票周一大幅下跌。【原文：UK gambling stocks slumped on Monday following a report that Chancellor Rachel Reeves may be weighing proposals to increase taxes on the industry by as much as £3 billion ($3.9 billion).】

item.title: 中国科技 ETF 因刺激经济而流入量居全球同类基金之首
item.description: 上周，由于散户投资者追逐经济刺激大潮后飙升的回报，追踪科技重镇创业板指数的中国交易所交易基金吸引了全球ETF中最大的资金流入。【原文：A Chinese exchange-traded fund tracking the tech-heavy ChiNext Index drew the largest inflow among ETFs worldwide last week, as retail investors chased returns that surged after an economic stimulus blitz.】

item.title: 雷诺发布法国制造电动汽车 售价低于 35,000 欧元
item.description: 雷诺汽车公司（Renault SA）推出了一款紧凑型电动汽车 R4 E-Tech，旨在帮助该汽车制造商更好地与以比亚迪公司（BYD Co.【原文：Renault SA unwrapped the R4 E-Tech, a compact electric vehicle meant to help the automaker better compete with budget offerings from Chinese manufactures led by BYD Co.】

item.title: A16z 支持的加密独角兽 Talos 希望将亚太区员工人数增加一倍
item.description: 数字资产交易软件供应商 Talos Trading 公司准备在未来 12 个月内将亚太地区的员工人数增加一倍。【原文：Talos Trading Inc., a software provider for digital-asset trading, is poised to double headcount in the Asia-Pacific region over the next 12 months.】

item.title: 中国的最新刺激措施能否修复经济？
item.description: 鉴于消费支出低迷、出口前景不明以及房地产市场依然不稳，中国今年 5% 的经济增长目标显得雄心勃勃。中国政府在 9 月下旬采取了一揽子刺激措施，引发了历史性的股市大涨。在投资者对支持规模感到失望之后，中国承诺采取新措施支持房地产行业，并暗示政府将加大借贷力度以支撑经济。前夜【原文：China’s economic growth target of 5% this year is looking ambitious, given sluggish consumer spending, an uncertain outlook for the country’s exports and a still shaky property market. Beijing responded in late September with a package of stimulus measures that prompted a historic stock rally. After disappointment set in among investors over the scale of the support, China promised new measures to support the property sector and hinted at greater government borrowing to shore up the economy. Eve】

item.title: 兰德水务公司对南非豪登省的临界水位发出警报
item.description: 南非豪登省是首都比勒陀利亚和商业中心约翰内斯堡的所在地，在持续的热浪条件下，豪登省的水库水位降至临界点，该省正处于水危机的边缘。【原文：South Africa’s Gauteng province, home to the capital of Pretoria and commercial hub of Johannesburg, is on the brink of a water crisis as reservoir levels drop to critical lows amid ongoing heat-wave conditions.】

item.title: 担心在线竞争对手影响销售，Dmart 股价下跌
item.description: 印度 Avenue Supermarts 有限公司（又称 Dmart）的股价创下了五年多来的最大跌幅，原因是人们担心网络竞争会影响该公司目前的商业模式。【原文：Shares in India’s Avenue Supermarts Ltd., also known as Dmart, fell the most in over five years on concern that online competition was impacting the company’s current business model.】

item.title: 布兰德斯基金以欧洲廉价股票抗衡美国科技股涨势
item.description: 欧洲表现最好的股票基金之一没有押注英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）或苹果公司（Apple Inc.【原文：One of Europe’s best-performing equity funds has matched the steep gains of US tech without betting on the likes of Nvidia Corp. or Apple Inc. — instead by buying some of the region’s most undervalued stocks.】

item.title: 韩国央行行长李明博称降息并非支点之后提升支出的灵丹妙药
item.description: 韩国央行行长李昌镛（Rhee Chang-yong）否定了加快降息以刺激消费的想法，重申了他的观点，即在上周期待已久的政策中枢调整之后，韩国央行将谨慎确定宽松步伐。【原文：Bank of Korea Governor Rhee Chang-yong dismissed the idea of faster interest rate cuts to boost consumption, reiterating his view that the central bank will be cautious in setting the pace of easing after last week’s long-awaited policy pivot.】

item.title: 马来西亚押注经济增长和林吉特升值以弥补预算缺口
item.description: 马来西亚经济部长拉菲齐-拉姆利（Rafizi Ramli）表示，马来西亚经济的快速增长和林吉特的走强正在减轻政府削减汽油补贴以实现今年赤字目标的压力。【原文：Malaysia’s faster economic growth and strengthening ringgit are reducing pressure on the government to cut petrol subsidies to meet its deficit target for this year, according to Economy Minister Rafizi Ramli.】

item.title: 路透社报道：印尼下任领导人希望因德拉瓦蒂担任内阁职务
item.description: 路透社援引未具名人士的话报道称，印尼当选总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）正在考虑向现任财政部长斯里-穆利亚尼-因德拉瓦蒂（Sri Mulyani Indrawati）提供一个内阁席位。【原文：Indonesian President-elect Prabowo Subianto is considering to offer a cabinet seat to current Finance Minister Sri Mulyani Indrawati, according to a report by Reuters, citing people it didn’t name.】

item.title: 新加坡将停止安联与收入保险的 17 亿美元交易
item.description: 新加坡政府正在寻求阻止安联集团（Allianz SE）以现有形式收购收入保险有限公司（Income Insurance Ltd.）多数股权的拟议交易。【原文：The Singapore government is seeking to stop a proposed deal by Allianz SE to buy a majority stake in Income Insurance Ltd. under its current form.】

item.title: 交易员权衡中国财政刺激政策和特朗普胜算，比特币跳涨
item.description: 比特币攀升至两周来的最高水平，因为市场对中国最新刺激措施的反应不一，这使得投机者更加大胆地打赌，他们将追逐加密货币，而不是中国的股票。【原文：Bitcoin climbed to the highest level in two weeks as a mixed reaction to China’s latest stimulus efforts emboldened wagers that speculators will chase after cryptocurrencies rather than the nation’s stocks.】

item.title: S&P 预计未来十年主权外债违约事件将增多
item.description: S&P Global Ratings 预测，在未来十年中，由于债务水平大幅提高和硬通货债务的借贷成本增加，主权发行人的外币债务违约将会增加。【原文：S&P Global Ratings predicts an increase in foreign-currency debt defaults among sovereign issuers over the next decade, driven by significantly higher debt levels and increased borrowing costs on hard currency obligations.】
